item.title: The inaugural Radisson Blu hotel in Bangkok
item.description:
Carlson Rezidor Hotel Group is celebrating the expansion of its Radisson Blu brand with the debut of its first Radisson Blu hotel in Bangkok. The Radisson Blu Plaza Hotel Bangkok, boasting 290 rooms, is strategically situated in Sukhumvit, a vibrant area known for its numerous offices, corporate headquarters, and retail outlets. This property marks Carlson Rezidor’s first Radisson Blu establishment in the city and is owned by G&P Asset Holding Company...

item.title: AccorHotels introduces the Pullman Bangkok Grande Sukhumvit
item.description:
Source: AccorHotels. The Pullman brand is expanding its presence in the Asia Pacific region with the addition of the Pullman Bangkok Grande Sukhumvit. This new hotel, formerly known as the Grand Millennium Sukhumvit Bangkok, will be the third Pullman in Bangkok, increasing the upscale brand’s room count by 325. Michael Issenberg, Chairman and CEO of AccorHotels Asia Pacific, expressed excitement about the new addition, highlighting its stylish accommodations designed for modern travelers...

item.title: Aloft Bangkok - Sukhumvit 11 now accepts e-signatures
item.description:
Source: Aloft Bangkok - Sukhumvit 11 website. The Aloft Bangkok - Sukhumvit 11 has introduced a paperless check-in experience featuring electronic signatures. This system aims to eliminate the need for printed documents and expedite the arrival process for guests. Aloft Bangkok claims to be the first hotel within the Starwood brand to offer this service. This innovative approach streamlines the check-in procedure by presenting all reservation details on a tablet...
